column1: * Beren and Lúthien return to Middle-earth
column2: both mortal. They inhabit Tol Galen and the area becomes known as Dor Firn-i-Guinar
column3: "the Land of the Dead that Live".

column1: * The Union of Maedhros clears Beleriand of orcs
column2: but in doing so reveals the Eldars full strength to Morgoth.

column1: * The Evil Breath is unleashed from Angband and Túrin falls ill.
